akn:section.akn:heading: Forest Service telephone lines; correction of inductive interference

akn:content.akn:p: § 580b. Forest Service telephone lines; correction of inductive interference Appropriations for the Forest Service shall be available hereafter for the correction of inductive interference on Forest Service telephone lines caused by transmission lines constructed by organizations financed by loans from the Rural Electrification Administration. (June 29, 1949, ch. 280, title I, 63 Stat. 338.)
